summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Family Court Parent Record-Keeping App with Court Date Countdown widget. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend mostly functional with minor UI interaction issues.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal dialog overlay prevents navigation clicks after form submission failures
Countdown widget not appearing on dashboard despite court_date event being created successfully
Navigation elements hidden on mobile/tablet views, hamburger menu may be needed

integration_issues.issue: Form validation errors not clearly displayed, causing submission failures

issues: Warm and friendly color scheme implemented correctly

passed_tests: Backend APIs - 100% success rate (30/30 tests passed)
Landing page loads with all sections
Dashboard shows stats cards and quick actions
Calendar navigation and event creation (court_date type created)
Documents page navigation and upload interface
State Laws page with California highlighted and all states listed
Mobile and tablet responsive design (layout adapts correctly)
Professional legal design with warm colors
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal dialog overlay issue preventing navigation after form errors. Investigate why Court Date Countdown widget is not displaying despite successful event creation. Improve mobile navigation visibility.
